description: The HSC_CYTOLOGY_COMMENTS table contains free-text special instructions for cytology specimens.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CYTOLOGY_SPEC_INSTR_CMT
columns.description: The free-text cytology special instructions for a specimen record.
